name: PictoMatch
description:
Ideograms are neat!

I used to struggle with kanji when I started learning Japanese and it wasn't until a teacher pointed out a very simple ideogram idea with the tree > woods > forest kanji that I started to notice patterns in this. 

This is intended for anyone to pick up and play no matter the Japanese language level :) (Also ignore my terrible strokes,, i haven't written kanji in almost 2 and a half years lol)

Attributes and credits are in read me as usual!

This was a submission to RMIT Game A Week 2022 - Words.
